scripts.start: npm run git && npm run client && npm run server
scripts.client: cd client && npm run init && cd .. && cp client/dist/* ./
scripts.server: cd server && npm run init && cd ..
scripts.client-now: cd client && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.server-now: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.git: git fetch && git pull origin master
scripts.meta: npm run git && clear && npm start
